actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A resolution congratulating and commending the members of the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams, and the United States Olympic Committee, for their success and inspired leadership.

summary.text: Commends the 2006 U.S. Winter Olympic and Paralympic Teams for their performance in Torino, Italy. Expresses appreciation for the U.S. Olympic Committee's leadership. Expresses encouragement to U.S. athletes preparing for the 2008 Olympic Games.

titles.title: A resolution congratulating and commending the members of the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams, and the United States Olympic Committee, for their success and inspired leadership.
